Title: Prohibits the importation or sale of animal products produced in a manner that violates New York's animal cruelty laws
Summary: Prohibits the importation or sale of animal products produced in a manner that violates New York's animal cruelty laws, in order to protect New York's farmers from unfair competition and to protect animals from cruelty.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to prohibiting the importation or sale of animal products produced in a manner that violates New York's animal cruelty laws
